DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Treatment with levosimendan will preserve myocardial function and hemodynamics after cardiac surgery and lead to reduced stay at intensive care unit
DOC.brief_title: Inotropic Treatment With Levosimendan (SimdaxR)in Heart Surgery
